publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2294# Trish Godman: Welfare Rights Service—That the Parliament notes with appreciation recent research findings of the Fraser of Allander Institute which show that last year the benefits generated by the Glasgow City Council Welfare Rights Service led to the creation of 264 jobs in Scotland with a value in wages of £4,491,003; congratulates all of those involved in this remarkable example of job creation, and commends the valuable work undertaken by welfare rights advisers throughout the country.
S1M-2294# Welfare Rights Service (lodged on 3 October 2001) Marilyn Livingstone*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2294# Welfare Rights Service (lodged on 3 October 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2294# Welfare Rights Service (lodged on 3 October 2001) Elaine Smith*
